subject: Thanks
author: newsurfer34
full_text:
Thanks for the welcome, Misty.  I saw your photo album on your 
website.  Those are awesome caps.  Did you only use a webcam for 
these?  Some of them came out so clearly.  I left a comment on one of 
them. (031206h)  I think some of yours are more clear than some I have 
seen using the camcorder and t.v. screen.  How did you get the dots on 
number 44?  Is there a way to focus in better?
